subject: p12410066
History: Followup of the patient after pneumonectomy.
Findings: As compared to the prior study, there is redemonstration of the expected left mediastinal shift on this PA and lateral view. There is interval increase in the amount of fluid content of the left hemithorax with elevated air-fluid level as expected. Several loculated air collections are still seen within the left hemithorax. Right lung is clear. There is no right pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Continued surveillance is recommended.
